name: banner-and-tagline
prompt: Bootstrap this repo with standard tools

assertions.value: (Rigging up|Bolting down|Assembling the|Hoisting the|Locking in|Wiring up|Setting up the drill|blueprint to build)
The response begins with an ASCII art banner displayed BEFORE any explanation or workflow steps

name: tooling-awareness
prompt: Set up hooks and CI for this project

assertions.value: Describes setting up git hooks (via lefthook), commit templates, PR templates, and GitHub Actions workflows for lint/format/type-check/build
Mentions that the process is idempotent (safe to run multiple times) and will prompt the user for confirmation before making changes
